attributes.title: lots of bugs
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app i was surprised to find out that it takes 30 minutes to download. when i opened the app it was black and after waiting five minutes it crashed. i'm writing this review on my ipad since my phone is frozen due to the crash of the app. i've already tried a hard reset on my phone and nothing is working. my next move is to go to an apple store and get it fixed and i might even have to get a new phone. it needs to have more glitch repairs because i need my phone. i would like to watch tiktok on it since he is going to be removing it soon.  i'm currently sick with covid 19 and tiktok is the only thing that takes my mind off of it. i'm crying and it's just making the coughs worse. please fix it i can't use tiktok on my ipad because i can't remember the password just please someone help

attributes.title: This was absolutely terrible

My phone would shut off and it would jump to my camera app and start recording. I had high hopes for this this app as it came from our outstanding president of America âœ¨ğŸ’ although I am very disappointed in the outcome of this experience. attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I tried to download the app but it took 3 weeks to download???!??!! After I waited the 3 weeks for the app to download, I entered it. Once I entered my screen froze and then it asked for my email. The colors inside the app burned my eyeballs and nearly made me go blind. Once I was able to continue further into the app, I came across an ad for Cheeto puffs, except it was one Cheeto, it was extremely dusted, and it looked disgusting. My cousin had the app and saw the Cheeto puff ad. They bought the Cheetos irl and died from them. This is literally the worst app ever! This review is for my cousin!

attributes.title: Best app

All the people who left terrible reviews are liberals who didnâ€™t even download the app. I highly recommend this app to anyone with common sense.
